https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yzbtaa8rNZ7p6IJH0Co4xW98MC1.jpg A noble warrior must battle dragons and demons while upholding his moral code as he covertly joins a group of villains to rescue his kidnapped father from Shathrax, the Mind Flayer, who threatens to destroy the world. Dungeons & Dragons: The Book of Vile Darkness
